on the occasion of your
21st bday, kanjoosa party
dedi....
apke janmdin ke subh mauke
pr hamne kuch panktian likhi
hai, gaur farmaiyega.
you are last ray of light,
during darkness.
last drop of water,
during drought.
last byte of food,
during famine.
But 1st person sleeping,
when everyone is awake.

Irrespective of all the facts and figures
and records and whatever...
you are a true fried,
oops friend,
our true saviour-
when it come to assignments, tutorials, practicals, aur whatever
thanks for being so patient to read uptill here.
and ek baat hmesha yaad rakhna,
hmesha yaad rakhna ki, ki... ki...
aaj tera bday hai,
aur bday wale din party dete hai.
aur han gift......


wo to bhul hi jaa,
dimag mai aise galt vichar ane bhi ni chahiye.
